review: Connects very easy.  Does what it's supposed to
author: Terry

review: If it had the Time Warner Cable App it would be complete. There aren't many apps to download either. But its a good product. I returned it and go the Roku for the TWC app. And is has more apps to choose from. We loved Netflix and Pandora though.
author: Natalie Pitts

review: I have the stick and the box version of Fire.  Despite the fact that they only show the stick and controller in all the pics you also really need to use the included powerpack and plug that into the stick. It makes it a little less portable than without needing it.  My biggest issue is that it buffers alot.  I have both units on the same wifi network and the box does not buffer as badly.  The stick does it all the time and it is 10ft from the router.  It is honestly so so because of that.
author: Graham Mingst

review: easy to figure out.  strong wifi signal.  good design
author: Brian Vigil

review: I was afraid I wouldn't be able to figure out how to connect everything. It was incredibly simple. I use Amazon instant video and Netflix. I highly recommend this cool little gadget
author: Karen Ann Scofield

review: Was easy to set up and use
author: Frank Menichini
